Summary.name: Introduction
Summary.content: Welcome to the SecondStax API documentation. This API allows you to interact with our mutual fund management system, handling user authentication, fund operations, subscriptions, transactions, and more.

Summary.name: Authentication
Summary.content:
Most endpoints require authentication. To authenticate, obtain a JWT token by logging in via the /api/v1/auth/login endpoint. Include this token in the Authorization header of your requests:

Authorization: Bearer <your_token_here>

Summary.name: Common Use Cases
Summary.content:
1. User Registration and Authentication:
   - Register a new user: /api/v1/auth/register
   - Login: /api/v1/auth/login
   - Use the returned token for authenticated requests
   - Logout: /api/v1/auth/logout
   - Refresh token: /api/v1/auth/refresh-token
   - Reset password flow: 
     /api/v1/auth/forgot-password
     /api/v1/auth/reset-password
   - Email verification:
     /api/v1/auth/verify-email
     /api/v1/auth/send-verification-email

2. User Profile Management:
   - Get user profile: /api/v1/user/profile
   - Update user profile: /api/v1/user/profile
   - Update password: /api/v1/user/update-password

3. Fund Management:
   - Get all funds: /api/v1/fund
   - Create a new fund: /api/v1/fund
   - Get a specific fund: /api/v1/fund/{id}
   - Update a fund: /api/v1/fund/{id}
   - Delete a fund: /api/v1/fund/{id}

4. Subscription Management:
   - Create a subscription: /api/v1/subscriptions
   - Get a subscription: /api/v1/subscriptions/{id}
   - Update a subscription: /api/v1/subscriptions/{id}
   - Delete a subscription: /api/v1/subscriptions/{id}

5. Transaction Management:
   - Get all transactions: /api/v1/transaction
   - Update a transaction: /api/v1/transaction
   - Get a specific transaction: /api/v1/transaction/{id}
   - Delete a transaction: /api/v1/transaction/{id}
   - Get transactions overview: /api/v1/transaction/overview

6. Portfolio Management:
   - Get portfolio performance: /api/v1/portfolio/performance
   - Get total investment: /api/v1/portfolio/total-investment
   - Get portfolio summary: /api/v1/portfolio/summary

7. Investor Management:
   - Get investor overview: /api/v1/investor/overview
   - Get investor list: /api/v1/investor/list

8. Partnership Management:
   - Get partnership overview: /api/v1/partnership/overview/{id}
   - Get partnership performance: /api/v1/partnership/performance/{filter}/{id}

9. List of Values (LOV) Retrieval:
   - Get partnerships LOV: /api/v1/lov/partners
   - Get countries LOV: /api/v1/lov/countries
   - Get currencies LOV: /api/v1/lov/currencies

Summary.name: Rate Limiting
Summary.content: Our API implements rate limiting to ensure fair usage. You are limited to 100 requests per minute. If you exceed this limit, you'll receive a 429 Too Many Requests response.

Summary.name: Errors
Summary.content:
The API uses conventional HTTP response codes to indicate the success or failure of an API request. In general:
- 2xx range indicate success
- 4xx range indicate an error that failed given the information provided (e.g., a required parameter was omitted, etc.)
- 5xx range indicate an error with our servers

Summary.name: Support
Summary.content: If you have any questions or need assistance, please contact our support team at api-support@secondstax.com.
